mapper.select: SELECT report_no reportNo , subject_name subjectName , report_title reportTitle , report_content reportContent , report_start_date reportStartDate , report_end_date reportEndDate , update_date updateDate , create_date createDate FROM report ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report( subject_name, report_title, report_content, report_start_date, report_end_date, update_date, create_date) VALUES (#{subjectName}, #{reportTitle}, #{reportContent}, #{reportStartDate},#{reportEndDate},now(),now())
